0032759110.details: 1 short cadence sector (6); tess-ebs morph 0.128 & period ~4.077 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.226; SpT M4.5Ve; eclipses of ~0.17 & ~0.15 mag, some noise & flares;
0032759110.notes: flattening of LC gives more durable fit; in the 2021ApJ...912..123J catalogue;

0037606218.details: 2 short cadence sectors (6 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.210 & period ~7.836 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.270; flat LCs with eclipses of ~0.12 & 0.02 mag (secondary total); discontinuities in S87;
0037606218.notes: discontinuities in S87 may be handled by detrending; shallowness of secondary mitigated by being total; in the 2021ApJ...912..123J catalogue;

0055497281.details: 41 short cadence sectors; tess-ebs morph 0.070 & period ~14.905 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.989; aka AL Dor; SpT F8V; in debcat; eclipses of ~0.5 & ~0.4 mag;
0055497281.notes: in debcat & already well characterised - may exclude; some potential L3 sources but at least 5 mag fainter; analysis based on cleanest contiguous pairs from across the TESS sectors;

0055659311.details: 26 short cadence sectors (1-2, 4-12, 61-65, 67-69, 87-90, 94-96); tess-ebs morph 0.049 & period ~31.113 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe -- with no parallax given; dist from Gaia DR2 ~500 pc; eclipses of ~0.25 & ~0.24 mag;
0055659311.notes: analysis on best contiguous sectors from across the range of obs; quit a fussy fit, with some warnings - needs more  work

0063192395.details: 3 short cadence sectors (6, 7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.528 & period ~3.065 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.259; eclipses of ~0.33 & ~0.30 mag; some ellipsoidal effect; eclipses have shifted phase by +0.05 by sector 87;
0063192395.notes: in TBOSB with per=3.065064 d; despite high morph all 3 sectors fit easily and are reasonably consistent; some crowding in view;

0063579446.details: 2 short cadence sectors (7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.382 & period ~5.583 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.003; sector 87 heavily distorted; eclipses of ~0.35 & ~0.30 mag; secondary may be total; some slow variability;

0066602813.details: 6 short cadence sectors (7, 33-34, 61, 87-88); tess-ebs morph 0.352 & period ~2.764 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.985; eclipses of ~0.6 & ~0.2 mag; slow variability - starspot?;
0066602813.notes: consistent results from fitting all sectors independently;

0077158150.details: 2 short cadence sectors (4 & 5); tess-ebs morph 0.466 & period ~2.487 d; not found in Gaia DR3; aka RZ Cae; eclipses of ~0.25 & ~0.15 mag; slight ellipsoidal effect; distorted region in S4;
0077158150.notes: not found in DR3 so need to source distance elsewhere;

0078568736.details: 3 short cadence sectors (6-7 & 33); tess-ebs morph 0.159 & period ~8.220 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.738; SpT G; eclipses of ~0.60 & ~0.12 mag; slow variability;
0078568736.notes: using flattening to remove variability on well detached system;

0080556181.details: 2 short cadence sectors (7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.481 & period ~2.820 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.705; eclipses of ~0.40 & ~0.26 mag; secondary eclipse may be total; eclipses show a phase shift of approximately -0.04 between the sectors;
0080556181.notes: S7 easily fits; S87 gives warnings but params consistent with S7 (due to ephemeris shift?);

0080650858.details: 4 short cadence sectors (7, 8, 61 & 62); tess-ebs morph 0.517 & period ~1.916 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.963; aka BH Pup; SpT B3/5III; eclipses of ~0.32 & ~0.10 mag; some variability; S8 heavily distorted after mid-sector break (clip region used); secondary eclipse may be total;
0080650858.notes: tough target - close B-Type - but LCs fit well so worth including; override teff_sys with starting value appropriate for B-type;

0118313102.details: 8 short cadence sectors (8-10, 35-36, 61-63); tess-ebs morph 0.180 & period ~9.256 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.962; aka NT Vel; SpT B6V(n); deep eclipses of ~0.69 & ~0.66 mag; clear pulsations; S8 distorted after mid-sector break; eccentric with phiS nr 0.4;
0118313102.notes: warnings on most if fitted individually; fitting combined 8-10 and 61-63 work w/o warnings and are consistent;

0140209204.details: 1 short cadence sector (5); tess-ebs morph 0.528 & period ~2.752 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.868; aka SV Col; deep eclipses of ~0.46 & ~0.44 mag; ellipsoidal effect;

0141685465.details: 26 short cadence sectors (4-13, 61-65, 67-69, 87-90, 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.220 & period ~7.807 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.882; flat LCs with eclipses of ~0.28 & ~0.06 mag;
0141685465.notes: using clean pairs of sectors from throughout the obs range;

0153709888.details: 2 short cadence sectors (4 & 5); tess-ebs morph 0.391 & period ~2.166 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.938; eclipses of ~0.08 mag; slight variation between sectors;
0153709888.notes: double tess-ebs period; better fit found by combining the sectors; no apparent sources of L3 & fit finds L3 approx -0.23; fit without L3 similar but LR higher;

0160328766.details: 4 short cadence sectors (6, 32-33 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.199 & period ~10.318 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.148; aka AW Col; SpT A3(m)A7-A7; eclipses of ~0.50 & ~0.15 mag; all sectors have at least 1 of each eclipse type;
0160328766.notes: well detached and highly eccentric; some crowding in field so leave L3 to fit; fits generates warnings but are consistent and should respond well to retries;

0198011271.details: 5 short cadence sectors (3-5, 69 & 97); tess-ebs morph 0.429 & period ~1.934 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.852; high snr; eclipses of ~0.60 & ~0.35 mag; slow and random variability;
0198011271.notes: combining sectors 3 to 5 may be best way of handling variability; flattening may loose some ellipsoidal variation;

0219421171.details: 3 short cadence sectors (3-4 & 67); tess-ebs morph 0.165 & period ~8.303 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.812; high snr; eclipses of ~0.20 & ~0.07 mag; slight eccentricity;

0238896417.details: 9 short cadence sectors (5-7, 61, 65, 68, 87-88 & 95); tess-ebs morph 0.153 & period ~16.244 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 6.978; good snr; eclipses of ~0.28 & ~0.24 mag; some discontinuities in LCs; slight eccentricity; nearby bright sources of potential L3;
0238896417.notes: may benefit further from flattening; initially S5 is the cleanest;

0259543079.details: 10 short cadence sectors (3-8, 30-32, 66, 90, 93 & 97); tess-ebs morph 0.010 & period ~40.304 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.901; good snr; eclipses of ~0.24 & ~0.10 mag; highly eccentricity;
0259543079.notes: joining sectors 3 to 5 give best coverage; warnings from jktebop but fit looks plausible; may benefit from flattening;

0260269456.details: 26 short cadence sectors (27-39, 61-62, 65-69, 87-89 & 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.169 & period ~10.796 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.893; good snr; eclipses of ~0.55 & ~0.40 mag; bright source of potential L3 just over 2 arcmin away;
0260269456.notes: test fit of S28-29 gets a fit but resids not good on eclipses; may benefit from flattening;

0260502102.details: 41 short cadence sectors (1-13, 28-36, 38-39, 61-69 & 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.125 & period ~7.315 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.316; ok snr; eclipses of ~0.22 & ~0.18 mag; highly eccentric; sparse field so may be able to fix L3=0;
0260502102.notes: test fit of S1, 2 & 3 give consistent fit if L3=0; in JustensenAlbrecht21apj table 3;

0260504147.details: 38 short cadence sectors (1-9, 11-13, 27-39, 61-62, 65-66, 87-89 & 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.179 & period ~8.418 d; not in Gaia DR3; SpT F6V; good snr; eclipses of ~0.20 & ~0.18 mag; slightly eccentric; potential sources of L3 nearby;
0260504147.notes: will likely need flattening for consistent & durable fit;

0278826516.details: 9 short cadence sectors (7, 9, 12, 61-62 & 66-69); tess-ebs morph 0.082 & period ~14.084 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.899; ok snr; eclipses of ~0.12 mag; discontinuities in S61, 62, 67 & 68; S9, 62 & 66 likely insufficient coverage for solo fit; potential sources of L3 nearby;
0278826516.notes: test fit of S69 (flattest) finds suspect fit with warning; will likely need flattening for consistent & durable fit;

0278826996.details: 14 short cadence sectors (6-7, 61, 66-69, 87-89 & 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.088 & period ~19.169 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.016; good snr; highly eccentric; eclipses of ~0.45 & ~0.30 mag; S67, 69, 87 & 94 likely insufficient coverage for solo fit; sparce field so may be able to fix L3=0;
0278826996.notes: will likely need flattening for consistent & durable fit; in JustensenAlbrecht21apj table 3;

0279741942.details: 10 short cadence sectors (2-4, 28-30, 68-69 & 95-96); tess-ebs morph 0.091 & period ~14.216 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.025; aka VY Ret; SpT F5V; excellent snr; highly eccentric; eclipses of ~0.58 & ~0.55 mag; potential sources of L3 nearby;
0279741942.notes: will likely require flattening to get durable fit;

0299903137.details: 2 short cadence sectors (6 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.139 & period ~18.3 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.858; excellent snr; differing eclipse widths suggest eccentricity; eclipses of ~0.6 & ~0.5 mag; potential sources of L3 nearby;
0299903137.notes: TESS-ebs period doesn't work for S87 - so details are from S6 which gives a good, durable fit;

0307488184.details: 14 short cadence sectors (5, 8-12, 62-65, 69, 89-90 & 96); tess-ebs morph 0.142 & period ~10.067 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.307; OK SNR; eclipses of ~0.17 & ~0.02 mag; secondary is total eclipse; potential sources of L3 nearby;
0307488184.notes: in JustesenAlbrecht21apj; shallowness of the secondary mitigated by totality; tests fits on S5 & S90 (best fit with L3 fixed at zero) in good agreement with JA21;

0319558164.details: 5 short cadence sectors (7, 61-62, 66 & 69); tess-ebs morph 0.115 & period ~8.980 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.107; good SNR; discontuities all sectors except 7; eclipses of ~0.29 & ~0.23 mag; source of L3 nearby;
0319558164.notes: TESS-ebs period incorrect, at least for S7; adopted 16.596535; setting logg_sys to 4.0 helps fit (LD params); will require flattening or high-order detrending to deal with variability;

0319863494.details: 6 short cadence sectors (7, 33-34, 61 & 87-88); tess-ebs morph 0.124 & period ~5.135 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.153; SpT A1V; good SNR; eclipses of ~0.25 & ~0.15 mag although they differ across sectors (L3?); crowded field so L3 likely significant; significant eccentricity and phase shift in later sectors;
0319863494.notes: TESS-ebs period incorrect - adopted t0=2206.68905, per=17.644114 & phiS=0.3 in test on S33+34; ideally, need pairs of sectors for good coverage; will require flattening to deal with variability;

0350298314.details: 30 short cadence sectors (1-4, 6-13, 61-69, 87-90, 93-97); tess-ebs morph 0.002 & period ~47.719 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.893; good SNR; slow variability; eclipses of ~0.30 & ~0.20 mag; possible source of significant L3 nearby; eccentric with very early secondary;
0350298314.notes: have yet to achieve a usable fit - will likely require flattening;

0382067804.details: 15 short cadence sectors (3-10, 13, 64-67, 87 & 93-95); tess-ebs morph 0.164 & period ~26.131 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.137; good SNR; flat LCs with eclipses of ~0.40 & ~0.35 mag; potential sources of L3 nearby; eccentric with late secondary;
0382067804.notes: will need to join sectors for good coverage; test fits of S5+6 & S62+63 work well with no errors and consistent params;

0384031569.details: 7 short cadence sectors (8-10, 62-63 & 89-90); tess-ebs morph 0.135 & period ~20.822 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 2.932; excellent SNR; generally flat LCs with eclipses of ~0.62 & ~0.55 mag; S8 distorted after mid-sector break (1534, 1543); potential sources of L3 nearby; slightly eccentric with some phase shift in later sectors;
0384031569.notes: will need to join sectors for good coverage; test fits of S9+10, S62+63 & S89-90 work well with no errors and consistent params;
